Function# IORecursiveLockSleepDeadline

macOS 10.6+

```
int IORecursiveLockSleepDeadline(IORecursiveLock *_lock, void *event, AbsoluteTime deadline, UInt32 interType);
```

### [Recursive Locks](/documentation/kernel/1552986-iorecursivelocksleepdeadline#recursive-locks)

[`IORecursiveLockAlloc`](/documentation/kernel/1553013-iorecursivelockalloc)Allocates and initializes an recursive lock.[`IORecursiveLockFree`](/documentation/kernel/1553031-iorecursivelockfree)Frees a recursive lock.[`IORecursiveLockGetMachLock`](/documentation/kernel/1552988-iorecursivelockgetmachlock)Accessor to a Mach mutex.[`IORecursiveLockHaveLock`](/documentation/kernel/1552995-iorecursivelockhavelock)Check if a recursive lock is held by the calling thread.[`IORecursiveLockLock`](/documentation/kernel/1553020-iorecursivelocklock)Lock a recursive lock.[`IORecursiveLockSleep`](/documentation/kernel/1553001-iorecursivelocksleep)[`IORecursiveLockTryLock`](/documentation/kernel/1552993-iorecursivelocktrylock)Attempt to lock a recursive lock.[`IORecursiveLockUnlock`](/documentation/kernel/1553032-iorecursivelockunlock)Unlock a recursive lock.[`IORecursiveLockWakeup`](/documentation/kernel/1553014-iorecursivelockwakeup)
